name: Red, White and Blue Ice Cream Pie
author: Reddi-wip
summary: A vanilla ice cream pie with a homemade graham cracker crust is layered with fresh blueberries and strawberries for a delicious red, white and blue holiday dessert.
ingredients: 2 ½ cups vanilla ice cream, softened
1 ¼ cups thinly sliced fresh strawberries
directions: Spray 9-inch glass pie plate with cooking spray; set aside
Stir together graham cracker crumbs and 1/4 cup sugar in medium bowl
Press mixture firmly in bottom and up sides of pie plate
Bake 6 minutes or until golden brown and set
Meanwhile, stir together water, remaining 1/4 cup sugar and cornstarch in small saucepan
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring frequently
Cook 5 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally
Remove from heat; let cool 5 minutes
Spread blueberry mixture evenly over crust
Spread softened ice cream over blueberry mixture
Freeze pie until firm, about 4 hours
Cut into 8 slices; top with Reddi-wip
